email.subject: Monthly Statement Available
email.content: Your Chase credit card statement for March 2024 is now available. Total balance: $1,247.89. Minimum payment due: $35.00 by April 15, 2024.

instructions: Test statement classification and data extraction
Send POST to /fine-tuning/classify-base for basic classification
Send POST to /fine-tuning/classify-fine-tuned for enhanced classification
Use /fine-tuning/compare to see improvement in accuracy and detail extraction

expectedResponse.reasoning: Official statement from legitimate bank with financial details
